alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:33PM CDT until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GRANT...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE AND SOUTHERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 333 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cane Creek to near Hensley Island, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Redfield... Orion... Cane Creek... Hensley Island... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Belfast... Hensley... Jefferson... Wright... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Kearney... Tar Camp Park... Ico... F.B. Baugh Recreation Area... Woodson... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
